issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
1. Base UI > Views > image view rapid update
2. watch it load
results: image loads in from left of screen (change in behavior form 1.6.2) not seen on newer devices
fields.summary: iOS: image view rapid update loads from the left side of screen (3.1.3)
fields.environment: INFO Titanium SDK version: 1.7.0 (04/26/11 11:54 6b80fd9...) iphone 3 (3.1.3) not seen on newer devices

comments.body: Closing ticket as invalid as this version of Kitchen Sink is no longer supported. There is now a new version of Kitchen Sink so if there are any problems, please file a new ticket.
